archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.4.8e: e) logging important details about the transfer (e.g. content of the media, protection applied, recipient details, times of despatch and receipt at the destination).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
